312391.「ただいまより 第１２回\n アストルティア・クイーン コンテストに\n 参加す:
It's time to introduce the fierce beauties
who will be participating in this year's
12th Annual Astoltia Queen Contest!

312392.「前大会で 好成績をおさめ\n 見事 出場権を獲得した ３名に加え……:
And now, joining the 3 winners with excellent
results from last year's contest...

312393.「ファルパパ神による特別推薦枠 １名と\n 総勢４８人の予選を勝ち抜いた 上位４:
We have a special recommendation from Falpapa,
as well as 4 winners from 48 preliminary
contestants. 8 beauties will aim for the top!

312394.「まずは 前大会の覇者が 堂々の登場だ！\n クイーンの座を射止めるという その:
First, we have our winner from the previous contest! Achieving her long-cherished dream of seizing the Queen's throne, she finally
was able to do so thanks to her indomitable spirit!

312395.「曇りなき まなざしは\n つねに 未来を見つめつづける……。\n 時をかける王:
Her clear gaze always looks forward towards
the future... The Time Traveling Princess,
Mereade!

312396.「私が クイーンになれたことで\n エテーネ王国のことも これまで以上に\n 知:
I feel that by becoming Queen, more people
have come to know of the Ethene Kingdom
than ever before.

312397.「でも まだまだよ。\n 未来のために もっと がんばらなきゃ。\n だから 二:
But I've still got a long road ahead of me.
For the sake of the future, I need to work
even harder! So, for my second win in a row...

312399.「続きましては この方です。\n 前回２位という 栄誉を授かり……:
Now, for our next contestant...
Having received the honor of finishing
in second place last time...

312400.「フン……。\n ２位が 栄誉とは 笑わせてくれる……。:
Hmph... To call second place an "honor" is
quite amusing...

312401.「ししっ 失礼しました！\n 前回のことは 置いておきまして\n 魔界最恐の 魔:
M...m...my apologies! Disregarding what took
place last time, here comes the most fearsome
Demon King in all of the Demon World!!

312402.「死を運ぶ 氷の魔女！ ヴァレリア！: The Witch of Ice who brings death! Valeria!

312403.「頂点に立たなければ 意味がない。\n それに ふさわしい者が 誰なのか……:
It's all for naught if you cannot rise above
everyone else. Now, who is worthy of such
a position...?

312404.「今一度 貴様たちに\n 知らしめねば ならんようだな！！:
Once again, I will make sure you all do not
forget!!

312405.「……続いては 前回３位の座を射止めました\n この方の登場です！:
Next up, we have our third place winner from
last time!

312406.「勇者である彼女は 決して くじけない。\n 勝利を目指して 今日もまた 戦いつ:
The Hero who never falters with victory always in her sight! Even today, her fight ever continues! The battle princess of
purity, Anlucia!

312407.「また こうして みんなに会える日を\n ずっと 楽しみに 待っていたの。:
Being able to meet with you all again today...
I've been looking forward to this day for a
long time.

312408.「長く つづいている この戦い。\n 今でも こうして 上位に残れているのは\n:
My fight is not yet over. Even now, the reason
I'm able to place so high is because of the
support from all of you...

312409.「もう一度 この手に\n クイーンの座を取り戻すまで\n 私は あきらめず 挑み:
Until I can claim the Queen's throne for
myself, I will not give up. I'll keep on
fighting!

312410.「続きましては ファルパパ神による\n 特別推薦枠から １名を\n ご紹介したい:
Next on our list, I'd like to introduce the
individual who received a special
recommendation from Falpapa...

312417.「超バズってるカフェで とりま\n アタシと ギャルトークしてみない？\n ウェ:
How about some girl talk at the super-
trendy Pazu Cafe? The sweet girl who has
a "way" with her words, Pico!

312434.「……ゴホン！\n では あらためまして ご紹介いたします。:
Ahem...
Allow me to introduce our newest participant.

312435.「人を愛し 人と生きることを選んだ……。\n 光とともに 神話の時代より 現れい:
Having chosen to love and live amongst humans,
she has shone since the days of the Mythical
Age...the Eternal Archangel, Lectalis!

312439.「……以上 ８名の美女たちが\n クイーンの座をかけて コンテストを争います。:
And so...these 8 beauties will compete to see
who is most deserving to be called Queen.

312440.「栄光の座に かがやくのは\n 果たして 誰なのか！？\n それを決めるのは あ:
Who will rise to the top this time?! It's up
to you to decide!

312441.「どうですか <pc>さん。\n 今回も選りすぐりの美女が そろいました。\n:
Well, what do you think? There's an amazing
selection of beautiful women for you to choose
this time. Who's your favorite?

312442.「クイーンにふさわしいと思う 美女が決まったら\n あなたの持つ票を 投じてあげ:
If you think any of these beauties deserves
to be Queen, then cast your votes!

312443.「なお 投票につきましては 集計係モカの所で\n おこなっていただくことに なっ: Please go and see Mocha if you'd like to vote.

312444.「票を投じましたら 会場案内係のファリネより\n お話がありますので お立ち寄り:
After casting your votes, please speak with
Farine for an important message. Thanks
for your cooperation!

313183.「ただいまより 第１２回\n アストルティア・クイーン コンテストの\n 結果発:
We will now announce the results of the
12th Annual Astoltia Queen Contest!

313184.「この ショコラフォンテヌ城の\n クイーンの座は いったい 誰の手に！？\n:
Who is worthy of being crowned Queen of our
Chocolat Fontenay Castle?! The results are
in!!

313185.「皆さま！ ステージに ご注目ください！:
Ladies and gentlemen! Please look to the
stage!

315085.「ついに このクイーン・コンテストに\n 神様までが 参加される運びとなりました:
Finally, a goddess has decided to participate
in the Queen Contest! Even I am truly
overwhelmed with emotion!!

315086.「女神ルティアナより 生まれた 七人の種族神。\n その一柱にして エルフたちを:
Born from the Goddess Lutiana as one of the
seven race gods who rules over all Elves...
The Goddess of Wind, Eldona!!

315087.「こちらこそ 呼んでいただき 感謝するのだわ。\n 神なる身で このような催しに:
I truly am grateful that I was invited here.
I never thought a goddess such as myself
would even be allowed to participate.

315088.「私が 見事 クイーンの座を射止めれば\n 母さまや兄さまに よろこんでいただけ:
If I'm able to secure the Queen's throne, then
Mother and Nadraga will be so pleased with
me! I can't afford to lose!

315089.「さあ エルフの民よ。愛しき眷属たちよ。\n 我が声にこたえ 目覚めなさい。\n:
Now, my beloved Elves... Answer my call and
awaken. You must cast your votes for the
Goddess of Wind!

315090.「ここからは 激しい予選を勝ち抜いた\n ４名の方を ご紹介いたします。\n 第:
Now, allow me to introduce the four contestants who made their way through the preliminaries! Claiming fourth place
is this little gal!

315091.「ウェ～～～イ！\n ピコちゃん 見・参～！\n みんな～ バイブス ブチ上がっ:
Waaaaaaay! The super cutie Pico is here!
Hiiiii everybody! I hope you're, like,
feeling some good vibes right now!

315092.「ショコラフォンテヌ城って キラッキラで\n デッコデコで マジきゃわたん！ こ:
This big chocolate castle is like, SO sparkly
and SOOO chic and cute! It'd be super cool
to be Queen of this castle, don'tcha think?!

315093.「よーし！ みんなの１票で\n アタシを 天の彼方まで バズらせちゃって！\n:
Yeah! I'm gonna like, need all of your super
cool votes to make it to the tippy top!
Way!

315094.「続いて 予選を第３位で突破した\n こちらの方に ご登場いただきましょう。:
Next up is this individual, who placed third
in the preliminaries.

315095.「クイーン コンテストの舞台に\n ふたたび 天使が 舞い降りる……。\n 天翼:
An angel once again descends onto the Queen
Contest's stage... The Seraphic Selector,
Yuliza!!

315096.「今一度 この舞台に立てたことを\n たいへん 光栄に思っています。\n みなさ:
Standing on this stage once again is truly
an honor. I have nothing but words of
gratitude for you all.

315097.「前回の参加では ふがいない結果を\n お見せしてしまいましたが\n 少しでも:
My results were disappointing last time, but
this time I will do my best to make it to the
top!

315098.「みなさんに 喜んでもらえるチョコを作るため\n フェディーラ様の特訓も 受けて:
I also had some special training with Fedira
to make chocolates that I'm sure you'll all
enjoy. I hope you'll like them!

315099.「続きましては 予選を２位で突破！\n そして 驚異の連続出場数 １０回を超えて:
Next up is second place from the preliminaries. This young woman has surpassed an astonishing TEN appearances in a row,
with this being her eleventh!

315100.「……これまでも これからも\n 永遠に あなたを いやしつづけたい。\n アラ:
She always has, and she always will want to
keep healing. The Blue Guide of Al-Ahagiro,
Seraphi!!

315101.「そっかあ……。\n もう そんなに このコンテストに\n 出させてもらってるん:
I see... It's really been this many times,
huh?

315102.「ぜーんぶ みんなのおかげだよ。\n これからも よろしくの意味も込めて\n 今:
And it's thanks to you all! I'm going to give
it my all this year too, so I'm counting on
your support!

315104.「さあ 第１２回\n アストルティア・クイーン・コンテスト\n 出場者紹介も い:
Our introduction of this year's participants
is nearly finished...

315105.「えっと…… クイーン・コンテストの会場は\n ここで 合ってるのかな？\n 初:
Umm...this is the place for the Queen Contest,
yes? It's my first time, so I wasn't quite
sure.

315106.「あれっ……？ なんだか\n 段取りを 無視してしまったみたいだね。\n ごめん:
Huh...? Oops, looks like I skipped a step.
My bad, my bad...

315107.「ぼくが 天使長レクタリス。\n なんの因果か わからないけれど\n このコンテ:
I am the Archangel Lectalis. I don't quite
understand how, but I've somehow ended
up as a participant in this contest.

315108.「こんなに 楽しそうなイベントを開ける未来が\n やってくるんだと思うと 感動し:
I'm quite moved by the idea of a future that
holds such an enjoyable event... I hope that
we all can tons of fun together!
